page.title: 19NEWSPAPERS
page.content: For about 10 years there has been a much used Parish Newsletter which, although church based, contains much village information. The September issue gives information of the following kind: church service times,details of cathedral visit,harvest festival details,result of church architects visit,details of forthcoming meetings of the Mothers Union,choir festival,Bible discussion group,young peoples group,over 60 club,handicraft classes,domino drive and village hall committee as well as the Vicar's letter to the parish. This an excellent way to communicate with all members of the community and it also shows that the area is active socially and that activities are available for all members whatever their age.
